text:
THE CURRENT OCCUPANT OF THE WHITE HOUSE IS NOT A DRUG SALESMAN.  HE SHOULD NOT BE ACTING LIKE ONE. HIS ADVICE MAY KILL YOU. 

What do you have to lose he asks?

Well looks like we are starting to find out. 👇👇👇https://t.co/XRnvMW2rBs
